import React,{useContext,useState}from"react";import ClientFinder from"../api/ClientFinder";import{ClientContext}from"../context/ClientContext";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddClient=()=>{const{addClient}=useContext(ClientContext);const[clientName,setClientName]=useState("");const[branchID,setBranchID]=useState("");const handleSubmit=async()=>{try{const response=await ClientFinder.post("/",{client_name:clientName,branch_id:branchID});addClient(response.data.data.client);// Adjust depending on actual API response structure
window.location.reload();}catch(err){}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-4 container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{action:"",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-row d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center padding;",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-auto mx-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:clientName,onChange:e=>setClientName(e.target.value),onChangetype:"text",className:"form-control",placeholder:"Client Name"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-auto mx-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:branchID,onChange:e=>setBranchID(e.target.value),className:"form-control",type:"text",placeholder:"Branch ID"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-auto mx-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSubmit,type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Add"})})]})})});};export default AddClient;
